example.question: A meteor in the atmosphere of Earth travels at 35 km/sec. It is slowed by friction with the atmosphere by 0.02 km/sec before it reaches the surface of Earth. What is the final the speed of the meteor caused by friction of the atmosphere?

B. 34.98 km/sec
C. 35.02 km/sec
D. 1750 km/sec
